page.title: 16POLITICS : SWANSEA WEST
page.content: The northern part of the area is represented on Swansea City Council and West Glamorgan County Council by Labour Councillors, but the remainder of the area is represented by Conservatives. At national level, the whole area is part of the Swansea West parliamentary constituency. The M.P. is Rt.Hon. Alan Williams, who is a front bench Labour Party spokesman. There is a Community Council for Killay. Its members are involved in local issues such as the problem of vandalism. This Council has little power, but it tries to influence the City and County Councils.
